name: flowcash
description: FlowCash — A Cash App clone built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL

scripts.migrate: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {Pool}=require('pg'); const fs=require('fs'); const pool=new Pool({connectionString:process.env.DATABASE_URL}); pool.query(fs.readFileSync('./src/database/schema.sql','utf8')).then(()=>{console.log('✅ Migration complete');pool.end()}).catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Migration failed:',e.message);pool.end();process.exit(1)})"
scripts.seed: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {Pool}=require('pg'); const fs=require('fs'); const pool=new Pool({connectionString:process.env.DATABASE_URL}); pool.query(fs.readFileSync('./src/database/seed.sql','utf8')).then(()=>{console.log('✅ Seed complete');pool.end()}).catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Seed failed:',e.message);pool.end();process.exit(1)})"
